child_given_npv_during_labor.label: Child Given NPV Syrup in Labor and Delivery Ward? (Mtoto alipewa dawa ya maji ya NPV katika wodi ya wazazi?)

milk_source.label: Child Milk Source: (Chanzo cha maziwa ya mtoto?)

hiv_diagnosis_dna_pcr.label: Was Child Diagnosed With HIV Using DNA-PCR(DBS)? (Je mtoto alitambuliwa kuwa na VVU kwa kutumia DNA-PCR (DBS))

hiv_diagnosis_antibody.label: Was Child Diagnosed With HIV Antibody or PCR As A Second Test? (Je mtoto alitambuliwa kuwa na VVU kwa kutumia kingamwili au PCR kama kipimo cha pili?)

hiv_diagnosis_date.label: When Did Diagnosis Take Place? (Utambuzi ulifanyika lini?)

child_taking_ctx.label: Is Child Taking CTX? (Je mtoto anatumia CTX?)

child_start_ctx.label: Did Child Start On CTX Between 4 Weeks and 2 Months of Age? (Je, mtoto alianza CTX kati ya wiki 4 na miezi 2 ya umri?)
